Environments

class morphgym.Env
Super

gymnasium.Env.

We don’t use gymnasium.vector.VectorEnv because we want to set different observation and action space for each agent.

EmbodiedEnv has some features:

  • It naturally supports parallel simulation of multiple embodied agent with same or different morphologies. For single morphology simulation, just pass a single agent using set_agent().

Environment dynamics (Simulation): terrains. Task performance: rewards. Simulator corresponding output: viewer, camera, images, information.

clear_agent()

remove agent from the environment and reset.

set_agent(agent)

put agents into the environment.

:param morphgym.Agent agent:

class morphgym.IssacGymEnv

This class is based on Issac Gym simulator.
